I'm trying to appreciate the simple things in life, like the weather.
i believe that mermaids are real.

participant_2.background:
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.
I don't like fast food, but I love a good cup of chai tea.
I knit myself a sweater that is so warm and comfy, and it also helps me fight my sweet tooth because I'm too busy knitting to eat gummy worms!
i worked 3 jobs at the same time for more than 5 years.
i am an award winning th member.

content.text: Hey! I'm trying to appreciate the simple things in life more, like the weather.
I know what you mean. When the weather is nice, it's so refreshing to go outside and enjoy it.
It really is. Do you have any other tips for appreciating the little things?
I like to take time to appreciate the people in my life. I have a lot of great friends and family members who I'm grateful for.
Me too. My fiance is amazing and I can't wait to start our life together.
Thanks! So, what do you do for fun?
I like to knit and crochet. I'm working on a sweater for myself right now.
That's awesome! I wish I could knit.
It's not as hard as it looks. You should give it a try!
You should! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
Have you ever tried chai tea?
It's a type of tea that's made with black tea, cardamom, cinnamon, ginger, and cloves. It's really good.
It sounds delicious. I'll have to try it.
You should! It's my favorite kind of tea.
